metadata.title: USGS CMG H-1-69-BS-cruise
metadata.description: Beach and offshore sediment sampling, assays of the samples for platinum and gold, and high-resolution seismic profiling for delineating subbottom features. Sampling used a one mile grid.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Investigate economic platinum placers offshore from Goodnews Bay.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned

Access constraints: Acknowledgement of data source publication required.
